CutSceneText.Text: The Aetheric Field around a fortress is a crucial line of defense--
as valuable as dozens of Archons.
Attackers who try to force their way through the Field suffer and die.
Unless the attackers have overwhelming numbers
it's certain they won't attack the fortress from the sky.
But they can make the Aetheric Field collapse
by destroying the generator inside the fortress.
That is the key to an assault's success:
taking out the Aetheric Field Generator.
